sect2.title: Creating a package
sect2.para: This will create a tarball named PDO_SKEL-X.Y.Z.tgz.

Before releasing the package, you should test that it builds correctly; if you've made a mistake in your config.m4 or package.xml files, the package may not function correctly. You can test the build, without installing anything, using the following invocation:
Once this is proven to work, you can test installation:
sect2.screen: $ pear package $ sudo pear install PDO_SKEL-X.Y.X.tgz
sect2.para: Full details about package.xml can be found in the PEAR Programmer's documentation (http://pear.php.net/manual/index.php).

sect2.title: Releasing the package
sect2.para: A PDO driver is released via the PHP Extension Community Library (PECL). Information about PECL can be found at http://pecl.php.net/index.php.
